name: Mokou's Quest
description:
Join Mokou as she ventures through to defeat whoever is causing this incident; Even with Mokou's infinite life, she has to kill enemies and burn objects to refill her life force.

Controls;
Arrow keys - Move
A - Jump
S - Attack
Q - Dash

Burning objects and enemies refills life.
Down+Attack stomps in the air and ground.
Holding Down without jumping moves the camera down.
If you die, quickly defeat enemies or burn things to come back to life.

Credits:
https://twitter.com/TheYawningFox - Programming/Pixelart/Some sound effects
https://twitter.com/Cherriip0p - Music/Sound effects (Twitter is NSFW)
